background.composition: Cascading neon green code on a black backdrop
background.arrangement: Vertical strings of characters ('digital rain'), densely layered for depth

subject_representation.method: Subject is constructed from clusters and gradients of glowing green code/symbols
subject_representation.integration: Subject blends seamlessly with the digital rain, edges defined by variations in code density and brightness

color_scheme.accents: Occasional brighter green or subtle yellow highlights for emphasis

special_effects.glow: Symbols and overall scene emit a soft, luminous, screen-like green glow
special_effects.motion_blur: Some vertical motion blur is applied to reinforce movement of the falling code
special_effects.depth: Variations in code brightness and blur create a layered, immersive cyber-digital effect

lighting.effect: Glow from code acts as ambient lighting, casting soft green illumination on subject edges

focus: Sharp-edged silhouettes formed by luminous symbols

art_style_profile.constraints: Avoid photographic realism, physical brushwork, or traditional shading. All forms, details, and lighting should originate from arrangements of glowing code.
